verses.verse: And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H8033>there<s%> toward the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H776>country,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> and <S%H7793>Shur,<s%> and <S%H1481>sojourned<s%> in <S%H1642>Gerar.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> of <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> She is my <S%H269>sister:<s%> and <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1642>Gerar<s%> <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah.<s%>

But <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> in a <S%H2472>dream<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> you are but a <S%H4191>dead<s%> man, for the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H3947>taken;<s%> for she is a <S%H1167>man's<s%> <S%H1166>wife.<s%>

But <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> had not <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> her: and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H136>LORD,<s%> will you <S%H2026>slay<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1471>nation?<s%>

<S%H559>Said<s%> he not to me, She is my <S%H269>sister?<s%> and she, <S%H1571>even<s%> she herself <S%H559>said,<s%> He is my <S%H251>brother:<s%> in the <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart<s%> and <S%H5356>innocence<s%> of my <S%H3709>hands<s%> have I <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2063>this.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him in a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> <S%H1571>Yes,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> in the <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of your <S%H3824>heart;<s%> for I <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H2820>withheld<s%> you from <S%H2398>sinning<s%> against me: <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H5414>suffered<s%> I you not to <S%H5060>touch<s%> her.

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H802>wife;<s%> for he is a <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and he shall <S%H6419>pray<s%> for you, and you shall <S%H2421>live:<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H7725>restore<s%> her not, <S%H3045>know<s%> you that you shall <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%> you, and <S%H3605>all<s%> that are yours.

Therefore <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H7925>rose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and <S%H1696>told<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> in their <S%H241>ears:<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> were <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H3372>afraid.<s%>

Then <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>What<s%> have you <S%H6213>done<s%> to us? and <S%H4100>what<s%> have I <S%H2398>offended<s%> you, that you have <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> me and <S%H5921>on<s%> my <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2401>sin?<s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H4639>deeds<s%> to me that ought not to be <S%H6213>done.<s%>
And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> you, that you have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing?<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> I <S%H559>thought,<s%> <S%H7535>Surely<s%> the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> is not in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> and they will <S%H2026>slay<s%> me for my <S%H802>wife's<s%> <S%H1697>sake.<s%>

And <S%H1571>yet<s%> <S%H546>indeed<s%> she is my <S%H269>sister;<s%> she is the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H1>father,<s%> but not the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H517>mother;<s%> and she <S%H1961>became<s%> my <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> caused me to <S%H8582>wander<s%> from my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> that I <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H2088>This<s%> is your <S%H2617>kindness<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H6213>show<s%> to me; <S%H413>at<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> we shall <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> of me, He is my <S%H251>brother.<s%>

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H5650>menservants,<s%> and <S%H8198>womenservants,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and <S%H7725>restored<s%> him <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> his <S%H802>wife.<s%>
And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> my <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> you: <S%H3427>dwell<s%> where it <S%H2896>pleases<s%> <S%H5869><s%> you.

And to <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he is to you a <S%H3682>covering<s%> of the <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> that are with you, and with <S%H3605>all<s%> other: thus she was <S%H3198>reproved.<s%>

So <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to <S%H430>God:<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7495>healed<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> and his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and his <S%H519>maidservants;<s%> and they <S%H3205>bore<s%> children.

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had fast <S%H6113>closed<s%> up <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7358>wombs<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H1697><s%> of <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H85>Abraham's<s%> <S%H802>wife.<s%>
